alert.note: Alert for Crowley; Otero (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 22 at 7:56PM MDT until June 24 at 1:43PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Pueblo CO has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Colorado... Arkansas River Near Fowler affecting Otero and Crowley Counties. .Heavy rainfall from the past couple days will cause flooding of the river near Fowler. For the Lower Arkansas River...including Fowler...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING TO EARLY SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Arkansas River Near Fowler. * WHEN...From Friday morning to early Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Moderate Flood. Moderate agricultural flooding occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:30 PM MDT Thursday the stage was 12.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning to a crest of 13.9 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 13.5 feet. - Flood History...No available flood history. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Friday morning at 800 AM MDT.
